function:
def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    
    Thought 2: The absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance can also influence the direction of the tip.
    New Feature 2: distance_difference | distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance - Right-Distance)
    
    Thought 3: The sum of Left-Weight and Left-Distance can represent the total weight on the left side.
    New Feature 3: left_total | left_total = Left-Weight + Left-Distance
    
    Thought 4: The sum of Right-Weight and Right-Distance can represent the total weight on the right side.
    New Feature 4: right_total | right_total = Right-Weight + Right-Distance
    
    Thought 5: The ratio of Left-Weight to the sum of Left-Weight and Left-Distance can indicate weight distribution on the left.
    New Feature 5: left_weight_ratio | left_weight_ratio = Left-Weight / (Left-Weight + Left-Distance)
    
    Thought 6: The ratio of Right-Weight to the sum of Right-Weight and Right-Distance can indicate weight distribution on the right.
    New Feature 6: right_weight_ratio | right_weight_ratio = Right-Weight / (Right-Weight + Right-Distance)
    """

    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Distance'] - df_output['Right-Distance'])
    
    # Calculate total weight on the left side
    df_output['left_total'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] + df_output['Left-Distance']
    
    # Calculate total weight on the right side
    df_output['right_total'] = df_output['Right-Weight'] + df_output['Right-Distance']
